Class SegmentedServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.jndn.utils.server.impl.ServerBaseImpl
      • com.intel.jndn.utils.server.impl.SegmentedServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Server, RepositoryServer, Runnable, net.named_data.jndn.OnInterestCallback

    public class SegmentedServer
extends ServerBaseImpl
implements RepositoryServer
    Implementation of a RepositoryServer that segments packets stored in its repository.
    Author:
    Andrew Brown, andrew.brown@intel.com
